channel.title: Utorrent help please?
channel.description: Hi, i got Utorrent, I got no-ip duc blah blah blah... But for some reason, if i post my server on moparscape server status page, it says it's off. can someone give me step by step instructions for how to turn my server on? Thanks

item.title: Utorrent help please?
item.dc:creator: @usualpker usualpker
item.description:
@usualpker wrote:

[quote=“Gh0stb4rr4g3, post:2, topic:240954”]Do you know how to “run” your server ?

Well download a source extract it and open the server file.

U’ll see a file with the name “run.bat”

Right click it , edit and check it if it has wrong codes / viruses etc.

If not double click it (run your server).

Refresh ur server IP’s.
(No-ip duc)

Did you portforward yet ? If not do that and repeat these steps ^

-gh0st[/quote]first, utorrent is a way to host WITHOUT portforwarding. yes i know how to turn on my server rofl

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent help please?
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Do you know how to “run” your server ?

Well download a source extract it and open the server file.

U’ll see a file with the name “run.bat”

Right click it , edit and check it if it has wrong codes / viruses etc.

If not double click it (run your server).

Refresh ur server IP’s.
(No-ip duc)

Did you portforward yet ? If not do that and repeat these steps ^

-gh0st

Read full topic
